alert.note: Alert for Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:24AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Woodruff, northeastern Prairie and southeastern White Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 624 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Pryor, or 8 miles northwest of Des Arc, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Des Arc... Griffithville... Sand Hill... Jasmine... Childers... Little Dixie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
